title: Excavation Viewer
description: An interactive 3D viewer of the excavation of prehistoric stilt houses at Attersee, Austria. A model of the surrounding area generated from satellite data, as well as high-resolution photogrammtery scans of the different excavation layers can be examined virtually. Various types of unearthed artefacts are marked for easier inspection.
role: 3D Asset preparation, 3D modelling, scene building, lighting

title: Hercules Beetle
description: Realistic model of a Hercules Beetle (lat. Dynastes Hercules), one of the largest beetles on the planet. Materials and textures are fully procedural. Hair particly systems and a full body rig for animation are included.

title: Virtual Gallery
description: An interactive experience of the degree program Media Technology & Design at the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria, available in VR or as a desktop version. Numerous works created during the course are exhibited. Modular displays (2D, 3D, audio, video & code/web/game) allow new projects to be added constantly.
role: Project lead, 3D modelling, interaction development, scene building

title: ArtisVR
description: A virtual reality application that allows users to quickly and easily furnish a room as desired. A room can be created with custom dimensions or selected from one of the predefined rooms. ArtisVR is meant as a brainstorming tool for interior designers and hobby users alike.

title: Spook - Toy Concept
description: A concept for a toy collectible. The different parts of 'Spook' can be rotatet and mixed up similarly to a Rubik's cube.

title: Realtime Voronoi
description: Realtime evolving pseudo-voronoi texture generated from 4D perlin noise.

title: Witch
description: Game-ready witch character with a beetle's shell as a protective shield.

title: Sound-reactive
description: Realtime sound-reactive visualisation of the song 'Sorrows of the Moon' by I Hate Models. Different parts of the 3D scene react to different instrumental layers in the music based on their frequency and amplitude.

title: This Website
description: I built this portfolio website mainly to show off my work but also to learn about frontend web dev and 3D in the web. All layouts, icons, images and 3D models are created by me with ❤️.
software: VS Code, React, three.js, Blender3D, Adobe Illustrator
